name: Fight or Flight (itch) (Zacoons)
description:
WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Equip

Made solo in 2 days for the 1-Bit Weekend Jam #2. I was going for the chemistry theme with Plasma Batteries for ammo and Titanium Shields for health but it adheres more the the gambling theme in that to equip ammo you must forfeit health and vice-versa. Credit for the awesome soundtrack goes to George Snow. Check out his channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBs5WrMzhyH0IM6Za4Ksu9Q
